title: Korean Style Chicken Thigh Tacos with Sesame Slaw
keywords: Korean, Tacos, Chicken, Fusion, Sesame, Slaw

method.step: Take your chicken out of the fridge, open the packet and let it air
trim then slice yout spring onion(s) finely, keeping the whites and greens seperate
Top, tail, peel and great your carrot(s)
Heat a large, wide based pan with a drizzle of vegetable oil over a heigh heat
once hot add yout diced chicken thigh and cook for 4-5 minutes  or untill lightly browned all over
Disolve your gochujang paste and chicken stock mix in your warm water
Add your suger, your paprika, half your rice vinegar and a pinch of salt
Give everything a mix up this is your gochujang stock
Once the chicken is lightly browned, reduce the heat to a medium heigh heat and add the gochujang stock
Stir it all together and cook, stirring occasionallly for 6-8 minutes  or until the cauce has thickend and the chicken is cooked through. This is your Korean style glased chicken
Wile the chicken is cooking, combine your chreaded red cabbage  greated carrot and spring onion whites in a large bowl this is your slaw mix
Add your mayo, remaining rice vinegar, tosted sesame oil and a generous pint of pepper to the slaw mix
Mix untill combined. this is your sesame slaw
When the chicken is nearly coocked, add your totillas to a place and pop them in the microwave for 20 secs on heigh or untill warmed though
Load up the warmed tortillas with the sesame slaw and korean style glased chicken
Drizzel over any remaining glaxe and top with the sliced spring onion greens and teasted sesame seeds
